data.prayer: Father, let those from the 167 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mostaganem, Algeria

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Mostaganem who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Mostaganem.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 167 believers in Mostaganem to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 245,232 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bedouin, Chaamba people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Mostaganem, Algeria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Mostaganem with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mostaganem, Algeria has a population of 245,400.

We estimate Mostaganem has 167 people who might know Jesus, 20 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 245,212 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,469 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Mostaganem.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
